mapper.select: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{tiltName} ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME DESC

select loc.DATE, loc.BATT, loc.TEMP,
`${col}` from ${info.tiltName} as tilt inner join ${info.structureName} as loc on tilt.opdatetime = loc.DATE

select loc.DATE, loc.BATT, loc.TEMP,
`${col}` from ${info.tiltName} as tilt inner join ${info.structureName} as loc on tilt.opdatetime = loc.DATE limit 10 offset #{offset}
select count(loc.DATE) from ${info.tiltName} as tilt inner join ${info.structureName} as loc on tilt.opdatetime = loc.DATE
select pwd, pointer from userInfo where pwd = #{pwd} and cnt = #{cnt}
mapper.update: update userInfo set status = #{status} where pointer = #{pointer}
